import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; const Products = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); return ( <>
Add New Product

{message}

All Products

{products.length > 0 ? ( products.map((product, index) => (

Name {product.name}

Category {product.category}

View
)) ) : (

No product data.

)}
); }; export default Products;
